1582.verse: فَلَا|So (do) not|97|105|208$تَكُ|be|47|62|4004$فِى|in|48|63|89$مِرْيَةٍ|doubt|69|84|8419$مِّمَّا|as to what|92|107|216$يَعْبُدُ|worship|70|85|6520$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ‌ۚ|these (polytheists).|151|166|335$مَا|Not|43|51|262$يَعْبُدُونَ|they worship|105|122|8757$إِلَّا|except|65|99|86$كَمَا|as what|73|107|110$يَعْبُدُ|worshipped|94|128|6520$ءَابَآؤُهُم|their forefathers|128|162|1476$مِّن قَبْلُ‌ۚ|before.|92|109|250$وَإِنَّا|And indeed, We|124|131|682$لَمُوَفُّوهُمْ|will surely pay them in full|191|205|8758$نَصِيبَهُمْ|their share|92|106|3952$غَيْرَ|without|70|84|560$مَنقُوصٍ|being diminished.|132|139|8759$

1583.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|91|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|90|509$مُوسَى|Musa|83|95|499$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book,|88|100|451$فَٱخْتُلِفَ|but differences arose|161|173|8760$فِيهِ‌ۚ|therein.|71|83|32$وَلَوْلَا|And if not|85|91|2238$كَلِمَةٌ|(for) a Word|102|119|8063$سَبَقَتْ|(that) preceded|126|160|8064$مِن|from|50|84|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord,|87|121|1322$لَقُضِىَ|surely would have been judged|225|242|5438$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|between them.|120|144|1056$وَإِنَّهُمْ|And indeed, they|133|182|5517$لَفِى|surely (are) in|113|162|1513$شَكٍّ|doubt|58|107|4619$مِّنْهُ|concerning it|106|130|571$مُرِيبٍ|suspicious.|92|92|8582$

1584.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|114|713$كُلاًّ لَّمَّا|to each [when]|123|156|8761$لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمْ|surely will pay them in full|191|224|8762$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|115|310$أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ‌ۚ|their deeds.|99|116|1459$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|141|396$بِمَا|of what|71|169|43$يَعْمَلُونَ|they do|92|190|912$خَبِيرٌ|(is) All-Aware.|115|164|2091$

1585.verse: فَٱسْتَقِمْ|So stand firm|108|124|8763$كَمَآ|as|53|84|110$أُمِرْتَ|you are commanded|153|184|8764$وَمَن|and (those) who|130|162|1012$تَابَ|turn (in repentance)|155|171|4956$مَعَكَ|with you,|82|101|4385$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|142|25$تَطْغَوْاْ‌ۚ|transgress.|94|132|8765$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|130|396$بِمَا|of what|71|109|43$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do|92|111|725$بَصِيرٌ|(is) All-Seer.|104|104|911$

1586.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|114|25$تَرْكَنُوٓاْ|incline|86|103|8766$إِلَى|to|53|70|118$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|106|20$ظَلَمُواْ|do wrong|81|98|558$فَتَمَسَّكُمُ|lest touches you|131|148|8767$ٱلنَّارُ|the Fire,|76|85|762$وَمَا|and not|71|86|46$لَكُم|(is) for you|94|124|207$مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah|143|173|2971$مِنْ|any|50|80|53$أَوْلِيَآءَ|protectors;|95|125|2754$ثُمَّ|then|50|80|293$لَا|not|42|57|30$تُنصَرُونَ|you will be helped.|143|143|8768$

1587.verse: وَأَقِمِ|And establish|108|115|8769$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|105|38$طَرَفَىِ|(at the) two ends|139|153|8770$ٱلنَّهَارِ|(of) the day|101|115|2743$وَزُلَفًا|and (at) the approach|168|182|8771$مِّنَ|of|50|57|156$ٱلَّيْلِ‌ۚ|the night.|85|91|1418$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$ٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ|the good deeds|123|135|8772$يُذْهِبْنَ|remove|78|90|8773$ٱلسَّيِّـَٔـاتِ‌ۚ|the evil deeds.|118|130|3823$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|76|28$ذِكْرَىٰ|(is) a reminder|116|122|5701$لِلذَّٲكِرِينَ|for those who remember.|186|186|8774$

1588.verse: وَٱصْبِرْ|And be patient,|123|139|8353$فَإِنَّ|for indeed,|91|123|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|85|184$لَا|(does) not|90|122|30$يُضِيعُ|let go waste|103|135|3505$أَجْرَ|(the) reward|104|120|3506$ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ|(of) the good-doers.|157|157|556$

1589.verse: فَلَوْلَا|So why not|96|129|635$كَانَ|had been|81|148|913$مِنَ|of|50|117|156$ٱلْقُرُونِ|the generations|124|191|8775$مِن قَبْلِكُمْ|before you|107|140|192$أُوْلُواْ بَقِيَّةٍ|those possessing a remnant,|210|222|8776$يَنْهَوْنَ|forbidding|84|109|5508$عَنِ|from|54|79|1663$ٱلْفَسَادِ|the corruption|114|139|8777$فِى|in|48|73|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|104|100$إِلَّا|except|65|77|86$قَلِيلاً|a few|63|86|433$مِّمَّنْ|of those|75|98|1061$أَنجَيْنَا|We saved|85|108|6953$مِنْهُمْ‌ۗ|among them?|108|131|730$وَٱتَّبَعَ|But followed|101|124|4492$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|101|20$ظَلَمُواْ|did wrong|84|91|558$مَآ|what|53|66|262$أُتْرِفُواْ|luxury they were given|171|184|8778$فِيهِ|therein,|71|84|32$وَكَانُواْ|and they were|116|129|615$مُجْرِمِينَ|criminals.|104|111|7714$

1582.verse: So do not be in doubt, [O Muhammad], as to what these [polytheists] are worshipping. They worship not except as their fathers worshipped before. And indeed, We will give them their share undiminished.

1583.verse: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.

1584.verse: And indeed, each [of the believers and disbelievers] - your Lord will fully compensate them for their deeds. Indeed, He is Acquainted with what they do.

1585.verse: So remain on a right course as you have been commanded, [you] and those who have turned back with you [to Allah], and do not transgress. Indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.

1586.verse: And do not incline toward those who do wrong, lest you be touched by the Fire, and you would not have other than Allah any protectors; then you would not be helped.

1587.verse: And establish prayer at the two ends of the day and at the approach of the night. Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds. That is a reminder for those who remember.

1588.verse: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.

1589.verse: So why were there not among the generations before you those of enduring discrimination forbidding corruption on earth - except a few of those We saved from among them? But those who wronged pursued what luxury they were given therein, and they were criminals.

1590.verse: And your Lord would not have destroyed the cities unjustly while their people were reformers.
